Inventory Control Subsystem is a minor project developed using COBOL programming language using clusters. In the first module, it finds that whether product is available in the stock or not, and then depending upon the result it shows all the details about the product and then calculate the price of each product. In second module, it generate report of the bill for the customer. And remaining products detail will be stored in a cluster.
